comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when double click the image in the table.

Build number:
2.2.1.v20071016-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open Report Examples View.
2. Select Reporting Feature Examples->XML Data Source->XMLDS_After.rptdesign 
   and click "Open" button.
3. Double click to open XMLDS_After.rptdesign and double click the image in 
   the table.

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.

Error log:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException: File not found:row["Channel Image URL"]
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.core.runtime.GUIException.createGUIException(GUIException.java:76)

GUI couldn't validate whether the expression is leagal. It's validated at runtime. Reassgin to DTE.
We shouldn't pop up the exception even if the file is not found. Should just display blank.
Fixed it. Add the exception in the log.
